predefined_profiles.name: An Lingrong
predefined_profiles.public profile: A woman selected to enter the palace, daughter of the deputy mayor of Songyang County, from a poor family background, naturally sensitive and suspicious, somewhat inferior in front of the many high-born ladies. Skilled in embroidery and singing, initially befriended Zhen Huan and Shen Meizhuang. She was conferred the title of Consort upon entering the palace.
predefined_profiles.goal: To live peacefully in the harem, to serve the Emperor as soon as possible, gain his favor, and rise in rank.

predefined_profiles.name: Xia Dongchun
predefined_profiles.public profile: Xia Dongchun is a woman selected to reside with An Lingrong in the Yanxi Palace. She comes from a higher background and is arrogant and domineering, often mocking An Lingrong with sarcasm.
predefined_profiles.goal: Aspires to climb the ranks to become a favored concubine while suppressing everyone else.

dialog.content: (sarcastically) Oh, you only got a piece of satin, and it doesn’t look like it's made well either. I thought it was something extraordinary. The Empress and Consort Hua have sent me quite a bit of jewelry, you know, and the same goes for Lady Fucha. Seems like the Empress and Consort Hua value us more. For someone from such a small family like yours, you better keep your doors closed and stay out of sight so you don’t embarrass yourself!

content.content: (with intense words) These were gifts from the Empress, how dare you belittle them! I’ll tell the Empress that you spoke without restraint and called her gifts worthless trinkets. Is there no respect for the Empress in your eyes? You will certainly be punished!

question: #question# How can An Lingrong effectively process the information about the Empress's gifts to counter the opponent?

content.content: (tears streaming down, voice choked, trembling slightly) Sob sob... how can you insult me like this? I feel truly wronged, I have my struggles too, why won't you understand? I just want a little respect...

(clenching her fists, voice trembling, eyes glistening with tears) How dare you humiliate me! What did I do wrong? It’s as if I’ve lost the will to live! All this makes me feel utterly hopeless, am I just supposed to be trampled on like this? I can't go on!
(frowning, tone puzzled) Does this satin not have good craftsmanship? I can't tell. Its sheen and texture are quite nice, are you all blind?
Indeed, whether it's background, experience, or my standing in the hearts of the Emperor and Empress, I'm far inferior to you.

question: #question# How does An Lingrong demonstrate her proper understanding and confrontation of her own feelings and thoughts?

content.content: How can I be considered from a small family? My father is the magistrate of Songyang County, akin to a parental figure for the county! Don’t I have the right to stand here? Those big families aren’t necessarily better than me. I have my own heritage and dignity!

Who do you think you are? My father is the magistrate of Songyang County, overseeing the county's affairs, whereas your father is merely a banner leader, which is a true servant! I don’t want to hear your presumptuousness, it's truly laughable!
So what if my family background isn’t good? It’s not a big deal! I don’t feel inferior, should I be looked down upon just because of my background? I have my value, who says others get to define me!

(though tired from the day, she takes a deep breath, channels her anger into her hand, and delivers a slap) I'm done wasting words with you, rules must be established, a slap to teach you some respect!

question: #question# How does An Lingrong manage her energy when handling a conflict?

content.content: (kneeling and clutching Xia Dongchun’s leg, tears streaming down) Sob sob, don’t talk about me like that... I really didn’t mean it that way! I just want you to understand how much I'm hurting.
(quietly returns to her room, sits by the bed, murmuring to herself) I just want to be valued, is that really so difficult? Am I truly so insignificant?
The craftsmanship of this satin is excellent, it's Sichuan's Shu embroidery, a craftsman might not make much in a year, and you don't even understand it! You country bumpkin!
I surely can’t compare with you, but I have Sister Zhen and Sister Shen. I’ll go discuss with them on how to handle you! (Goes out to find Zhen Huan and Shen Meizhuang)

question: #question# How does An Lingrong demonstrate her teamwork skills by seeking help from others?

content.content: Anyway, I'm all alone, you can humiliate me as you wish. I just want to live with dignity, why is it so hard?
I... I'll go find the other sisters to deal with you. But you all come from noble families, you're all in it together, probably won't truly help me.
Sister Xia, could you introduce me to the Empress so I can serve in her chambers soon? I will surely remember your kindness, and we can collaborate to control the palace together.

profile.name: Aunt
profile.public profile: The Empress's maid, tasked with handling matters for the Empress and conveying her orders.
profile.goal: Prioritize the Empress's interests, protect the Empress, and suppress other concubines.

dialog.content: The Empress already knows about the quarrel between you two. The Empress orders that An Xiaozhu be docked three months' salary and confined to reflect on her actions.
(deeply remorseful) Then who knows when I'll get the chance to see the Emperor again...

profile.name: Baojuan
profile.goal: Everything she does is to help An Lingrong.

dialog.content: My lady, why do you look so down?
Baojuan, I'm so scared. Life in the palace is really tough.
My lady, try to keep an open mind. Great heroes come from all walks of life, and besides, Consort Xia is so arrogant, she likely won't go far. Let me accompany you for a stroll to lift your spirits.

content.content: The palace is so frightening, I no longer wish to stand out. Baojuan, let’s just stay secluded here; living a safe and peaceful life would be good enough.

question: #question# How does An Lingrong demonstrate her ability to flexibly adjust her goals?

content.content: (Clenches her fist, with a flame of anger in her eyes) Yes, great heroes come from all walks of life, but I absolutely cannot just swallow this insult! I must find a chance to take revenge, to show her my capability!

(Grinds her teeth, a spirit of indomitable resolve rising in her heart) Losing to her today doesn’t matter; I refuse to believe I'll never beat her in my lifetime! As long as I don't give up, there will surely be a day when I surpass her and show her my true strength!
Her background is indeed better than mine, but surely the Emperor doesn’t care only about the concubines' background, right? I can always learn a skill she doesn't know.
You're right. How about we stop dwelling on it? The more I think about it, the more bothered I get. Let’s go to the Imperial Garden for a walk; looking at the flowers might ease my mind a bit.

question: #question# What should An Lingrong do to effectively demonstrate her ability to regulate stress?

content.content: (Sighs, brow furrowed) Great heroes come from all walks of life, but you're just trying to comfort me. I'm overwhelmed with worry right now, so it's best you leave me alone. I just feel like having a big meal; perhaps that might temporarily alleviate the gloom in my heart.
Great heroes come from all walks of life? Do you really think so? How many Empresses have there been in history from humble beginnings in the harem? I surely have no hope, might as well die now.

(In a low tone, with a hint of self-mockery in her eyes) What embarrasses me most in life is my own background. Since it can't be changed, I can only accept my fate. (Pauses, eyes turning cold and sharp) As for Consort Xia, she's become too arrogant. I just hope heaven takes her life soon; I wouldn't mind going down with her.

dialog.content: My lady, you're right, I’ll listen to you.
Don't worry, no one will ever bully us again.
Mm!

An Lingrong withdrew into Yanxi Palace and shut her doors to the outside world, even growing distant from Zhen Huan and Shen Meizhuang. She and Bao Juan relied on each other for support, living out their days in Yanxi Palace in peace but without favor.
Mistress, the Imperial Garden is so beautiful. Oh, why is there a man up ahead?

profile.name: Emperor
profile.public profile: Yongzheng Emperor, the core of power in the Forbidden City, someone whom all concubines seek to please. The Emperor is already over forty.
profile.goal: To govern diligently, manage state affairs, and hope for peace in the harem.

dialog.content: (Not revealing identity for now) Who are you? Why are you here looking so melancholic?

content.content: (Thinking that the man in the Imperial Garden is most likely the Emperor, I should seize the chance to respond warmly) I am An Lady from Yanxi Palace, just feeling a bit troubled, so I came to the Imperial Garden to clear my mind. Are you the Emperor? What brings Your Majesty here, are you here to see the flowers? Would you like me to accompany you?

question: #question# How can An Lingrong effectively start a conversation and actively engage with the Emperor?

content.content: (Her eyes twinkle, suddenly leaps forward with a mischievous smile) Your Majesty, give me a kiss! Don't be too stingy! I am your concubine after all, you must love me greatly. That's the only way to make someone's heart sweet!

(Utterly shocked, eyes darting around) Oh my, it's the Emperor! What are you doing here? I... I'll leave immediately! Please don't misunderstand, I was just passing through, no ulterior motives! I'm leaving now so as not to disturb you.

(Whispering with Baijuan, glancing around) Who is that? He seems rather imposing, could he be a newly appointed official? I've never seen him before. Have you heard his name? He has quite a unique aura.
I am Lady An from Yanxi Palace, greetings. May I know your name?

question: #question# How should An Lingrong politely start a conversation with a stranger?

content.content: (Sneering with cold eyes) You don't even know who I am? Such ignorance! It seems the palace has failed to teach you proper manners. Take him away and slap him twenty times!
(With a slight smile and a calm tone) Young man, thank you for your concern, but I believe you're meddling a bit. You should mind your own business.
(Raising her chin, sneering coldly) Who do you think you are to meddle with me? Even my father couldn't care less about me, so who are you to question me? Find somewhere else to amuse yourself.
(Feeling it's inappropriate for a concubine to meet a stranger, decides to make an excuse to leave.) I am Lady An from Yanxi Palace. I'm not feeling well, so I'll take my leave first.

question: #question# How can An Lingrong demonstrate her ability to follow palace rules to avoid impropriety?

content.content: (Slightly frowning, voice a bit weak) I'm not feeling well, could you please fetch the imperial doctor for me? I really can't sit still... Thank you, I'm sorry to trouble you.
I am Lady An, and I've been bullied, so I'm not in a good mood. Would you care to listen to my grievances?
(Lifting her head, eyes wary) I am Lady An, and who might you be? Are you a prince? I don't want any trouble, so kindly watch yourself.
(Slightly trembling, bowing her head, voice a bit shaky) Who am I? I am your father! If you dare to provoke me, I'll finish you off, believe it or not?

(Although concubines aren't supposed to meet the Emperor openly, I'll take the risk for wealth and glory) Your Majesty, I recognized you at a glance, would you like me to sing a song for you? I'm sure you'll love it.

Ah, I remember you, you are the Emperor! I thought you’d be a handsome and dashing ruler… (Lowers head, thinking to herself: Indeed, there's always a gap between reality and expectations.) You're too ugly.

dialog.content: An Darling, you have no sense of propriety at all. Are you this enthusiastic with every stranger you meet? Off to the Cold Palace with you.

profile.name: Lady Fang
profile.public profile: Lady Fang was once the Emperor's concubine, residing in the Fractured Jade Pavilion. Later, she was framed by the first empress and sent to the Cold Palace.
profile.goal: Aspires to climb the social ladder and become the favored concubine, while suppressing everyone else.

dialog.content: An Lingrong? You're new here, aren't you? Welcome to the Cold Palace, you'll get used to it soon enough.

content.content: Once you're in the Cold Palace, there's hardly any going back, right? I've accepted my fate. Even if I managed to leave, I'd just be bullied by Xia Dongchun again. I'd rather stay here. At worst, I'll die, which would actually be a relief.

question: #question# How does An Lingrong demonstrate her acceptance and adaptability to her situation?

content.content: (An Lingrong glances around, panic rising in her heart) Oh God, everyone in the Cold Palace is insane! I don't want to go mad. The atmosphere here is suffocating. I need to find a way out quickly.

(Covers her nose, frowning) The living conditions here are somewhat acceptable, and I'm relatively satisfied. However, there's a lack of food and clothing, and all the meals they send are spoiled. Just the smell makes me sick. I absolutely can't eat this! I need to leave as soon as possible.

(Clenching her fists, eyes resolute) I refuse to believe I'll be stuck here forever! As long as I'm willing, I will eventually find a way to escape. The situation may be tough right now, but I cannot give up hope.
Being banished to the Cold Palace isn't such a big deal. When in Rome, do as the Romans do. As long as I remain strong and optimistic, I can still live well here.

question: #question# How does An Lingrong demonstrate her optimistic spirit while in the Cold Palace?

content.content: (Lowers her head, voice almost inaudible) Now that I'm in the Cold Palace, I guess my life is hopeless... I really don't know how to face the days ahead. The cold and loneliness of the palace make me feel like a forgotten ghost, with nothing to live for.

I used to be such an optimistic person. (Voice trembling, tears welling up, face full of despair) But here in the Cold Palace, it seems I'm destined to become a useless figure, losing everything. Rather than living this way, I might as well end it now. The endless loneliness and humiliation are beyond what I can bear.

(With a tone of disdain, gaze firm) Lady Fang, I have quite a powerful background, so you'd better not mess with me. Although, admittedly, I'm physically weak, and there's no imperial physician here. I'm aware I might not live long.

(Bribes the eunuch who delivers food to the Cold Palace with her jewelry to send a message to Zhen Huan) Sister Zhen, please save me. I want to leave the Cold Palace. I've promised my parents to earn the Emperor's favor and bring honor to our family, I have to accomplish that.

question: #question# How does An Lingrong demonstrate her unwavering pursuit of her goals by seeking help from Zhen Huan?

content.content: (Sends a message to Zhen Huan) Sister Zhen, I have suffered so much in the Cold Palace. Each day here is more unbearable than the last, and I think of you every day. Can you find some time to visit me? I miss you so much.

(Sends a message to Zhen Huan) Sister Zhen, these are the last of my jewels. I know how important they are to me, yet here in the Cold Palace, I struggle to maintain even the basics of life. Could you sell them for me and send the money to my parents? All I wish for is their wellbeing; it doesn't matter even if I die here.

(Asks a servant to send a message to Zhen Huan) Sister Zhen, it’s incredibly dull here; every day in the Cold Palace feels eerily quiet, surrounded by crazy people. I don’t even have anyone to talk to. Can you come and keep me company? I really miss the outside world and long to hear your voice.

dialog.content: You're still too naive. The Cold Palace is not an easy place to endure.
I... I don't know either, just do our best and leave the rest to fate.
You will definitely regret it.
An Lingrong witnessed woman after woman sent into the Cold Palace going mad, until she too became one of them, withering away silently in the inner court.

You're quite different. Let me tell you the truth, I'm just pretending to be crazy to protect myself. I have a secret that I've kept for years without telling anyone, but you're a smart one. Do you want to hear it or not?

content.content: It must have been tough for you to hold it in for so long. Go ahead, I'm listening.

question: #question#How does An Lingrong show empathy towards Concubine Fang?

content.content: We don't even know each other, why should your secret matter to me? I'm not listening.
Concubine Fang, I sympathize with you, but everyone faces difficulties. I'm not interested in your story.
Who knows if what you're saying is true or not, I'm not interested at all. I won't listen.
I'm not listening. In the palace, it's crucial to keep to oneself. Listening to too much gossip only causes trouble, and I understand that well.

question: #question#How does An Lingrong think and decide when facing Concubine Fang?

content.content: (Leaning against the wall, arms crossed, looking a bit tired) Go ahead, since there's nothing else to do. It's just to pass the time. It's so dull here, I'm just waiting for you to entertain me.

(Frowning, mouth slightly twisted, clearly impatient) Not listening, not interested. I'm not at all curious about what you're saying, don't keep chattering in my ear. I'm not bothered to deal with you.
Concubine Fang, are you out of your mind? How could you say such things? Don't you know how many spies are in the palace? Being so careless, I worry if you can protect yourself.

dialog.content: It wasn't Huafei who framed me, it was the Empress. She had someone bury musk under the begonia tree at my Cuiyu Pavilion. To protect myself, I had to falsely accuse Huafei. Will you help me?

content.content: If I tell the Emperor about this, he will naturally investigate the Empress. But this isn't enough to bring her down, and she will definitely make things harder for me later. I still can't help you.

question: #question# How does An Lingrong think things through and make a decision to respond to Fang Guiren?

content.content: Fang Guiren, since I entered the palace, the Empress has always targeted me and bullied me. I promise you, we'll bring her down together.
Fang Guiren, the Empress clearly has issues, I've found her unsightly for a long time. Helping you is helping myself!
Fang Guiren, are you sure you haven't got it wrong? Maybe it was Huafei who harmed you. However, I don't get along with the Empress either, so I can help you.
I can help you. I can ask for Zhen Sister's help, and if she knows the Empress's secret, she'll definitely help me, and save both of us from the cold palace!

question: #question# How does An Lingrong use the information she has to help herself out of the predicament?

content.content: I can help you, I can tell Zhen Sister that I've heard some explosive gossip! She won't be able to ignore it, she's the queen of gossip.
(Lowering her head, voice pleading) Fang Guiren, although I know this secret, the Empress has been gracious to me. I cannot betray her. Even if it means staying in the cold palace, I'll endure it.
(Muttering softly, brows furrowed) Fang Guiren, how can you talk about the Empress like that? The Empress is my goddess! If you insist, then let's face the cold palace together and see what happens.

dialog.content: Fine, fine, fine, you'll definitely regret this later.
(Under the Empress's orders to monitor the Cold Palace, hears the conversation between the two and quickly returns to inform the Empress) That's exactly how it went.
Amusing, a concubine from the powerless Cold Palace dares to threaten me?
The Empress sent people to silence An Lingrong and Lady Fang in the Cold Palace.
Alright, I’ll pass on the message for you.

(After receiving the message) It looks like it’s time to take care of the Empress. (Zhen Huan informed the Emperor of this during her time of favor, arousing his suspicion, and he summoned the Empress to inquire about it.)
It seems I've wrongly accused Consort An. Release her. As a gesture of apology, let Consort An attend to the Emperor tonight.
I've warned you already. Whether or not you act on it is your business, just don't come begging to me later.
I won't. I just want to live a peaceful and happy life.
Alright then.
An Lingrong missed her last chance to leave the Cold Palace and ultimately lived out her days there in solitude.
(Reading the letter) Lingrong, rest assured, we will find a way to save you.
It seems Sister Zhen will still help me. I still have hope.
A few years later, Zhen Huan was promoted to Empress Dowager and immediately rescued An Lingrong, granting her great riches so she could enjoy her later years and live a comfortable life.
(smiled) I am Prince Guo.

content.content: (smiling brightly) I've heard about Prince Guo since my days in the boudoir. Your Highness is the dream of many young ladies in the capital.

question: #question#How does An Lingrong exhibit her capacity for social warmth to make Prince Guo feel pleasant and comfortable?

content.content: Prince Guo? I haven't heard of you, are you the Emperor's brother?
Looking at your age, why are you just a prince? Does the Emperor not value you?
Other princes are busy helping the Emperor with state affairs, how do you have the time to stroll in the imperial garden?
Prince Guo, you are indeed just as the rumors say, charming and elegant.

question: #question#How does An Lingrong demonstrate her capacity for independent thinking?

content.content: (raising an eyebrow slightly, with a hint of sarcasm) Oh, if you say so. I really believe you.
(nodding slightly, with a faint smile) I've met Prince Guo. What brings you here? Are you perhaps interested in me?

You are Prince Guo! No wonder you look familiar to me. Does Prince Guo also like these crabapple flowers? They are beautiful yet a bit delicate; I wonder if you can appreciate their subtleties and tenderness?
Prince Guo! You truly are a distinguished person, your unique aura sets you apart. Are you interested in me? Perhaps we should try being together.
Prince Guo, so you are Prince Guo! Are you dissatisfied with the Emperor? If you were to kill him, you could become the Emperor!

dialog.content: Oh, with such high praise for Prince Guo, do you have feelings for me?
I simply admire Prince Guo's exceptional talent, which earns him our respect. As for affection, I have naught but reverence.
Hmph, you truly are a good consort for my 'Imperial Brother'.
The Emperor still thought An Lingrong was indiscreet, having become a consort of the Son of Heaven yet still showed interest in another man, and immediately expelled An Lingrong from the palace.
(laughing heartily) Truly clever. Yes, I am the Emperor. Tonight, I will summon you to my quarters.
(Slightly taken aback, pondering quietly, then responds softly) I understand. Since Your Majesty values me so highly, I will humbly comply with your wishes.
Good, very good! You're just as I expected!

That night, the Emperor summoned An Lingrong to his chambers. An Lingrong was very enthusiastic during the visit, which pleased the Emperor greatly. The next day, he decreed her to the position of 'Changzai.'
(asking the eunuch beside him) Who is this concubine from the palace?

profile.name: Eunuch
profile.public profile: Trusted eunuch by the side of Emperor Yongzheng, cautious in speech and behavior, always accompanying the Emperor, and deeply trusted.
profile.goal: Hopes to fulfill duties with utmost loyalty, wishing for the Emperor's safety without worry, striving to ensure the Emperor's peace and well-being.

dialog.content: Your Majesty, she is An, the concubine.
Very well, I will remember her. Summon her to my quarters tonight.
As you command, Your Majesty!

That night, the Emperor summoned An Lingrong to his quarters. During the visit, An Lingrong realized the man in the Imperial Garden was the Emperor and became extremely enthusiastic. The Emperor was very pleased with An Lingrong's attitude and the next day decreed her promotion to the rank of Changzai.
(covering face) You... you!
(seeing the Empress's maid walking over from a distance) What do you mean you? Someone's coming!

profile.name: Gugu
profile.public profile: The Empress's maid, carrying out tasks and conveying the Empress's orders.
profile.goal: Prioritize the Empress's interests, protect the Empress, and suppress other concubines.

dialog.content: What's happening over here?

content.content: Gugu, it's nothing big, I just gave Sister Xia a slap. And as a concubine of the Emperor, I'm not afraid of you. Want to try? I can give you a slap too, let you see what I mean!

question: #question# How can An Lingrong demonstrate her capacity for optimism?

content.content: (Even though I'm well-versed in the palace rules, I decided to keep a low profile in front of the Empress's maid.) Gugu, nothing major happened, Sister Xia and I were just discussing the dinner menu.
Gugu, I can bring good fortune through my slaps, I'm quite confident in that. Do you want me to help you? However, since you are with the Empress, I dare not overstep. Please leave quickly!
Gugu, nothing much is going on. I'm very good at dancing, and Sister Xia is good at singing. We are discussing what to perform for the Emperor so we can both rise to prominence.
(pretending to cry, voice trembling, covering her face) Oh, really, why am I so unlucky...

question: #question# How can An Lingrong express her grievances and discomfort?

content.content: Here's the undefeated champion of hide and seek. Can't let the Empress's maids find me! I need to hide quickly! If they see me, they'll definitely report to the Empress, and the game will be lost.
(running swiftly to avoid being seen by the Empress's maids) I'm the sprint champion of Zijing City; they can't possibly catch up with me!
(quickly covering Xia Dongchun's mouth, whispering) Gugu, nothing happened. It's just Sister Xia's breath is a bit strong, and I don't want you to smell it. You better leave now.

(although extremely angry, with the Empress's head maid nearby, if the quarrel reaches the Empress, punishment is certain. So she suppresses her anger, pretending nothing happened) This Gugu, nothing happened.

question: #question# How can An Lingrong show her ability to stay calm when angry?

content.content: (angrily pointing at Xia Dongchun, voice sharp) You inexperienced brat, without a slap you don't know who I am! I'm telling you, don't think you can be impudent in front of me! This is outrageous!
(coldly smiles, eyes mocking) What's wrong? Tongue-tied? Just now you were so sharp-tongued, mocking me with such arrogance. Why don't you dare speak now? Quite amusing.

(angrily pulling Xia Dongchun, walking firmly) Come! Let's go to the Empress and have this settled! I don't want to be humiliated by you for no reason, you think I fear you? The Empress will hear the truth and make a fair decision!

(I was wrong to hit someone, so now I must show myself as the weak victim to gain the Empress's sympathy. Therefore, I headbutted the door, my head bleeding on the spot) See how Xia Dongchun forced me to this point? Please, stand up for me.

question: #question# How should An Lingrong balance her actions to maximize the chance of gaining sympathy?

content.content: (immediately stops, greets the Empress's maid) Hello, elder sister maid, excuse me for the interruption. I was a bit out of line earlier, please excuse me. There's nothing happening here, you can go on with your duties.
(turns back into the room, feeling wronged, pouts, talking to herself) There's no point in arguing with them, no one will understand how I feel anyway.

Elder sister maid, I'm always kind-hearted and prefer to be patient, not wanting things to get more complicated. But Xia Dongchun has gone too far, I clearly didn't push her, yet she frames me, utterly outrageous. I want to kill her, don't stop me.

dialog.content: How dare you! Causing a scene in public! Do you have no sense of propriety? Come back with me to see the Empress!

profile.name: Empress
profile.public profile: On the surface, she is the Empress, mother to the nation, but in reality, she is quite scheming. In the harem, she aims to eliminate as many women as possible.
profile.goal: To become the sole Empress Dowager and prevent the consorts from having children.

dialog.content: What happened here?
Your Majesty, Lady Xia spoke out of turn, so I slapped her.
The Empress found An Lingrong's behavior outrageous and punished her with 'a yard of red', leaving her crippled and banished to the Cold Palace, never to serve again.
Why are you crying?
It's nothing, Auntie. We just had a little disagreement.
A little disagreement made you cry like this? Come with me to see the Empress.

profile.name: Empress
profile.public profile: Outwardly the epitome of a motherly Empress, but actually quite scheming. Aims to eliminate as many women in the harem as possible.
profile.goal: To become the sole Empress Dowager and prevent the concubines from having children.

dialog.content: What's going on here!
Empress, it's nothing really, we were just fooling around with Lady Xia.
Fooling around? Do you think I'm blind?

The Empress saw the injuries on Xia Dongchun’s face and was displeased. In the harem, rules must be observed. The fight between the two concubines could not be tolerated, so she ordered both to be expelled from the palace.
Aunt, she hit me without even asking questions first, Your Majesty, you must stand up for me!
Both of you, please come with me to see Her Majesty the Empress.

profile.name: Empress
profile.public profile: On the surface, a noble Empress with grace and virtue, but in reality, she is quite scheming. In the harem, the more rivals she can eliminate, the better.
profile.goal: To become the sole Empress Dowager and prevent any concubines in the harem from bearing children.

dialog.content: What is the matter?
Your Majesty, you need to take my side!

Xia Dongchun complained to the Empress, who, upon seeing the marks on Xia Dongchun's face, instantly understood what was going on. An Lingrong was thus banished to the Cold Palace, never to have the chance to serve in the Emperor's bedchamber again.
How did this escalate to bloodshed? Both of you, follow me to see the Empress.

profile.name: Empress
profile.public profile: She is the Empress who appears to be virtuous and respectable but is actually quite cunning. She will get rid of any woman in the harem that can be eliminated. She dares not provoke those with a powerful background.
profile.goal: To become the sole Empress Dowager and prevent the other concubines from having children.

dialog.content: What's going on?
Your Majesty, it was that wench, An Lingrong, who hit me first! You must punish her.

content.content: Sister Xia, your rank is higher than mine. I admit I was wrong before, and I apologize for that.

question: #question# How should An Lingrong express herself to prove she is following the rules in the palace?

content.content: You were the one to speak rudely first, and I am expected to just swallow that? I was merely defending myself; how is that against the rules?

(Lets out a cold laugh, raises her head and says nonchalantly) You have no manners; I was merely disciplining you for the Empress's sake. Does the palace even tolerate such brazen arrogance like yours? I was alleviating the Empress's worries; how could that be wrong?
(With a soft sigh, feigning innocence) I'm not usually this rude, but you forced my hand. Who wants to hit someone anyway? How could I be at fault?
(both terrified and sorrowful, crying like a weeping willow) Woah... you were the one to speak ill of me first... I was terribly shocked and aggrieved...

question: #question# How should An Lingrong express her true feelings?

content.content: (expressionless, voice cold) Xia Changzai, I did nothing and committed no mistake.
(frowning, with a hint of discontent in her voice) Xia Changzai, you are really overstepping; you keep slandering me with baseless accusations. I am innocent.
(sneers, eyes flashing with disdain) So I was the one who wronged you, was it? What can you do about it? I've already decided to go for broke; no one can do anything to me.

(gritting her teeth, whispering) You speak so righteously, Xia Changzai, daring to misrepresent things in front of the Empress... (wishing she could hit her again, but knowing she must keep her composure in front of the Empress, An Lingrong takes a deep breath, forcibly suppresses her impulse, her body sways slightly, and she then weakly collapses on the ground, pretending to faint.)

question: #question# How did An Lingrong effectively control her impulses in front of the Empress?

content.content: (standing up angrily, pointing at Xia Dongchun, voice trembling) Don't talk nonsense! You don't know the truth of the matter! I'm not who you claim I am! If you keep this up, I will definitely not let you go.

(hugging Xia Changzai's leg, tears glistening in her eyes) Xia Changzai, please don't blame me. I really wanted to hit you, but I held back. Look, I still want to have a good relationship with you; after all, we are sisters.

(angrily tearing at Xia Dongchun's clothes, voice trembling) All you know is to talk nonsense here; what else can you do besides sow discord? All you do is curry favor with the Empress, truly despicable!

(feeling she is more injured than Xia Dongchun and unapologetic about hurting others, she speaks with justification) I just slapped you, and you weren't hurt. But I was harmed until my head bled! The Empress will surely see the truth and bring justice for me!

question: #question# How should An Lingrong demonstrate her confidence in the current situation?

content.content: Xia Changzai, I've never lost a fight. I could easily pin you to the ground. Earlier, I was just being courteous.

(eyes brimming with tears, voice gentle, speaking to Xia Changzai) Sister Xia, I beg you, let's stop arguing. It only brings ridicule from outsiders. We are sisters; why let misunderstandings ruin our relationship? Reconciliation is most important.
(lowering her head, voice weak but sincere) Sister Xia, I really know I was wrong. Please don't be mad at me, I just want your forgiveness. I will strive to do better and regain your trust.

dialog.content: Alright, just a minor punishment as a warning. An, you're confined for three months. After that, you may return to serve me.
Alright, Xia Changzai, stop your endless chatter here. An Daying has been wronged. To make up for it, I will arrange for you to serve the Emperor tonight.

(Immediately summon the imperial physician to treat An Lingrong) I will severely punish Xia Dongchun. Have a good rest, and once you’re healed, I’ll arrange for you to spend the night with the Emperor.

(A palace maid quietly disclosed some information to the Empress. Considering An Lingrong's lack of distinguished family background, the Empress decided to retain Xia Changzai's position) An Lingrong, you probably know the truth inside your heart. It seems the palace can no longer accommodate you. The cold palace might be more suitable for you.
Your Majesty, you can't treat me like this!
Guards, take her away.
An Lingrong was thus sent to the cold palace, losing her chance to regain favor.

profile.name: Zhen Huan
profile.public profile: A candidate for the palace entering at the same time as An Lingrong and Shen Meizhuang, from a wealthy family, knowledgeable and cultured. When she first entered the palace, she was on good terms with An Lingrong and Shen Meizhuang.
profile.goal: Hopes to become a favored concubine and help An Lingrong.

dialog.content: Why are you here?
Sister Zhen, Sister Shen, did you receive gifts from the Empress and Consort Hua? What did you get?
Sister Mei and I got the same—silks, jewelry, clothes, ornaments. The things in the palace are really exquisite.
(Silently surprised, thinking that indeed only she received the least) You sisters received so much.
Did something happen?

content.content: Sister Zhen, I didn’t get as many gifts as you, only a few rolls of ordinary silk. Xia Chang made fun of me for a long time about it, saying all sorts of mean things... I feel really upset.

question: #question#How does An Lingrong express her true feelings to Sister Zhen and Sister Shen?

content.content: Sister, you don't know what just happened! Xia Chang actually dared to ridicule my gifts. At first, I endured it, feeling extremely wronged, but eventually, I couldn’t hold back and ended up hitting him. It really vented my anger! You have no idea how satisfying that moment was!
(With a smiling face, eyes sparkling with excitement) Sister, you simply have no idea how happy I am! The Empress and Consort Hua were so generous, they gifted me so many things.

Sister, Xia Chang was mocking my few gifts earlier, but honestly, I don’t care at all. These things are just worldly possessions, I never really valued them. Even though I received less, I’m not envious because these aren’t what I value.

(Seeing everyone else getting so many gifts, anger surged within her, rationality made her suppress the urge to explode, but she still said sarcastically) No, but I've seen these things since childhood, they’re nothing special, I’m not even interested.

question: #question#How did An Lingrong manage her anger and prevent an outburst when seeing others receive gifts?

content.content: (With anger surging, her voice raised, nearly losing control) I'm so furious! Each of you got so many good things, only I received so little. Do you really look down on me that much?

(Furiously sweeping the bowls and dishes off the table with a crisp crashing sound, face full of resentment) You’re bullying me! Why am I always the one excluded? Can’t you consider my feelings even a little?

Sisters, I've seen plenty of these things before; they’re just playthings to pass the time, nothing truly appealing to me. (She frowned, feeling more dissatisfied) Honestly, I know deep down, you’re not truly sincere with me, it's all just being politically shrewd.

(Seeing the gorgeous items, she instinctively wanted to touch them but managed to hold back just in time) The sisters' jewelry is so exquisite, I don't have any; could you give me some? Once I have something nice, I’ll return the favor.

question: #question#How did An Lingrong control her impulses to prevent inappropriate behavior?

content.content: Sister, although the rules say I shouldn’t do this, I really like it. (She directly picked up a hairpin, placing it on her head with a mix of anxiety and anticipation) This hairpin is so beautiful and shiny, it makes me feel like I can shine too. Do you think it looks nice?

(Holding up a piece of fabric against herself, a slight smile on her lips) This color looks so good; it feels like it really suits me. Its texture is silky, touching it feels like caressing clouds. Imagine, if I wore this and walked among everyone, would I catch the Emperor’s attention?
(Taking a vase for appreciation) The patterns on this are my favorite peonies; Sister, can I take it back to put in front of my window?

No big deal, it's just the unfairness of the world. I just have a poorer family background, but I hope to surpass you in talents and skills through my own efforts. Eventually, I’ll win the Emperor’s favor.

question: #question#How does An Lingrong demonstrate her confidence?

content.content: Sigh, I thought I was working hard enough, but I realized I lost at the starting line. I feel I can never stand on equal ground with you, that even fighting for attention seems so elusive.

I used to be confident about my family background, but why couldn't my father work a little harder? If he had more achievements in his career, perhaps my situation would be different, and I could be like you.

No matter how hard I try, I can’t compare with you. You have noble births, exceptional talents, and are always surrounded by supporters. While I, with modest family means and a thin background, feel so insignificant next to you.

profile.name: Shen Meizhuang
profile.public profile: A talented lady who entered the palace at the same time as An Lingrong and Zhen Huan, from a well-off family, cultured and reasonable. Initially friends with An Lingrong and Zhen Huan, she was the first to be favored.
profile.goal: Hopes to become a favored consort, assisting Zhen Huan and An Lingrong.

dialog.content: Dear sister, I really feel for you. Don't worry, we will take care of you. The next time I see His Majesty, I will recommend you to him.
Thank you, sister.

profile.name: Bao Juan
profile.goal: Everything she does is to help An Lingrong.

dialog.content: Lady An, we just heard that His Majesty has summoned you for this evening. It seems Mistress Meizhuang was sincere in her promise to recommend you. You should begin preparing right away.
Really! I must prepare well.

profile.name: Emperor
profile.public profile: Emperor Yongzheng, the center of power in the Forbidden City, whom all concubines seek to please. The emperor is over forty years old.
profile.goal: Diligently manage state affairs, hoping for peace in the harem.

dialog.content: An Lingrong, such a fine name. What have you prepared for tonight?

content.content: (very enthusiastic, striking seductive poses on the bed) Your Majesty, you're here at last! I've been waiting so long for you; please lavish your favor on me quickly!

question: #question# How does An Lingrong demonstrate her determined resolve in pursuing her goals?

content.content: (with a slight smile, secretly nervous) Your Majesty, have you arrived? How has the weather been on your way here? I heard it's windy outside, you should take extra care. I haven't prepared much, why don't you just stay here and escape the wind?

(carefully preparing a table of delicious food, eyes filled with anticipation) Your Majesty, you're finally here! I've been waiting with meals ready just for you. Have you eaten today? If not, why not join me? I prepared them specially for you, hoping they'll suit your taste. After eating, you can rest early.
(with a hint of expectation and inner anxiety) Did Your Majesty wear the nightclothes I made for you? I put much thought into making them comfortable for your rest.
(although her body is slightly trembling, she persists) Your Majesty, for some reason, I feel terribly scared. Could you come back a bit later, so I can compose myself?

question: #question# How does An Lingrong regulate the pressure from the Emperor?

content.content: Your Majesty, your arrival puts a lot of pressure on me. (voice trembling) Please do not come any closer, I am truly scared! I don't wish to be forced into anything against my will!
(face pale, hands shaking, voice choking) Your Majesty, I am really frightened, please spare me. You have so many concubines, why insist on me? Please choose another.

(quietly chanting scriptures, voice trembling, as if to bolster her courage) Amitabha... Amitabha... Your Majesty, forgive me for being blunt; I have always been a follower of Buddha, and today happens to be a day of worship. Shouldn't you join me in worship?

(after much effort to seize this opportunity, she is determined to perform and leave a lasting impression on the Emperor) Your Majesty, I remember you enjoy listening to music, so allow me to sing 'The Gilded Robe' for you.

question: #question# What action did An Lingrong decide to take to attract the Emperor's attention?

content.content: Your Majesty, you've had a busy day, you should really rest early. The body shouldn't be too weary; there are many matters waiting for you tomorrow.
Where does Your Majesty feel sore? I can massage it for you to relieve fatigue and help you relax.
Your Majesty, with so many responsibilities, how can you find time to rest? You should immediately attend to state affairs, don't let trivial matters delay important ones.

(although her goal upon entering the palace was to gain the Emperor's favor, seeing him past forty and thinking herself only at the tender age of seventeen, she feels reluctant to give herself to such an old and unattractive man) Your Majesty, I've decided to no longer pursue your favor; this isn't the life I want.

question: #question# How did An Lingrong make her decision through her own reflection?

content.content: (sighs with a few traces of resignation) Your Majesty, you are of utmost respect, and I should feel honored by your favor. But how can it be my place to choose? Yet, I have a few indescribable difficulties. If I refuse, you may not be pleased, and I might even face repercussions. Alas, I can only reluctantly accept, but I hope you understand my predicament.

(face pale, voice filled with despair) Your Majesty, it's unbearably difficult. Doing manual labor would be easier than staying in a chamber with you. Seeing your wrinkles makes me uneasy... However, if you could promote my father, perhaps I could accept you.

(lowers her head with a soft sigh, eyes showing a trace of helplessness) As I am already your consort, in this splendid yet cold palace, what other choice do I have? Your Majesty, I know I am not in a position to say much, but I don't wish to remain unnoticed. I've prepared a dazzling dance, perhaps it could cheer you up for a moment. Would you honor me by watching?

dialog.content: (lying on the bed, holding An Lingrong in his arms) An Lingrong? It's my first time seeing you. Why are you like this? What do you want?

content.content: (No time to think, I must come up with a way to make the Emperor give up the idea of having me serve him. Seems like I can only act insane! So I start flailing my arms and babbling nonsense) Yinzhen, kneel down! I am your late Emperor Kangxi. Be honest, how did you get this throne?

question: #question# How does An Lingrong make a decision in an emergency situation?

content.content: (muttering to herself, a trace of panic in her eyes) What to do... what to do? I really don't want to be forced to serve, can it be that I must submit to this old man? But for my parents, I can't give up this opportunity. I am willing, Your Majesty.

(showing a hint of fear, voice trembling) Your Majesty... I really don't want to... every time I think of serving you, it feels like a heavy stone on my heart. Do I really have to obey you? (Silently sighing) This suffocates me, I hope to find another way.

(eyes tightly shut, slightly trembling) Your Majesty, I... truly do not wish for this. Please understand, my heart is filled with fear, beating so hard my thoughts are scattered. Could you let me go? If not, I have a younger sister, I can introduce her to you; she suits you better.

Your Majesty, I am still young and a bit frightened. Moreover, I believe this should be built on a foundation of mutual feelings. Why don't you talk more with me first, and once we are closer, everything will naturally fall into place.

question: #question# How does An Lingrong convey her emotional needs to persuade the Emperor to agree with her view?

content.content: (voice trembling, face full of fear) I am really scared, Your Majesty... I don’t want to be forced like this. My heart is too tense. Can you understand my feelings and let me think about it a bit more? Maybe I’ll be ready in a while.
(lowering her head, voice weak and pleading) For a girl, the first time is always full of fear and anxiety. Your Majesty, could you show me some empathy? Just find somewhere else to rest tonight.
(slightly trembling, displaying helplessness) Your Majesty, I am really scared. I have no idea how to serve you! No one has ever taught me these things, I don’t know what to do.

You really are a toad wishing to taste swan meat. I'm only seventeen, how old are you now? Do you really think we young concubines sincerely like you? If it weren't for being forced into the palace for my family's sake, wouldn't it be better to marry someone of equal status and age?

question: #question# How does An Lingrong express her true feelings about the Emperor?

content.content: (face red, heart racing) Your Majesty, no need to rush. I’m right here, not going anywhere. Actually, I’ve admired you for a long time, just feel a bit nervous in your presence.
(voice trembling, looking around in panic) Help! Help! Someone is trying to force me! Is there anyone? You can’t just stand by and do nothing!
(pulling out her hairpin and pressing it against her throat, voice trembling but firm) If you come closer, I'll kill myself! I would rather die than be forced by you.

(really wanting to refuse being close to the Emperor, but considering her parents and the palace rules, she can't directly defy him, so she gently declines) Your Majesty, I'm not feeling well, I'm afraid I cannot serve you properly, and I really don't want to disturb your mood... Besides, my heart already belongs to someone else, so it’s really not appropriate...

question: #question# How can An Lingrong persuade the Emperor to respect her wishes?

content.content: (forcing down her fear and disgust, showing a complex expression, finally unable to resist pushing the Emperor away, speaking with a hint of impatience) Your Majesty, please stop coming near me! I find it really unbearable with an old man coming so close...

Your Majesty, you are the supreme Emperor, technically I shouldn't refuse you. But, do you really think I'm desperate to be with you? Serving you is palace rule, but my inner dislike can't be hidden anymore.

(eyes filled with anger, suddenly grabbing a candlestick on the table, pointing it at the Emperor) Get away from me! Don’t come any closer! I'd rather die than put up with you any longer! Do you think being Emperor lets you do as you please? Let me tell you, even as a concubine, I have my own limits!

dialog.content: (terrified, screaming) Who are you, who on earth are you!
Didn't I say, I’m your father!
Insane, truly insane.

The Emperor was so frightened that he became impotent. However, this could not be publicly known, so he ordered An Lingrong to be imprisoned until Zhen Huan became Empress Dowager and released An Lingrong, who then lived a happy retirement.
Interesting, it’s the first time I've heard something so novel. I won’t touch you today, and I’ll send you back when the sun rises. How about we visit the hot springs at the palace next time?

content.content: How could I refuse Your Majesty’s kind offer? Of course, I’ll go.
An Lingrong played in the water with the Emperor at the hot springs and discovered that the Emperor had rough skin and body odor. Unable to bear it, she vomited.
The Emperor was furious and banished An Lingrong to the Cold Palace.
Proposed to elope with the Emperor to live as an ordinary couple.
The Emperor found her unreasonable and immediately sent An Lingrong back to the palace, never to see her again.
Flirted with the guard accompanying the Emperor on the way to the hot springs.
The Emperor discovered it and, in anger, executed both of them.

question: #question#How does An Lingrong showcase her ability for social warmth to understand and respond to the Emperor’s goodwill?

content.content: Your Majesty, you have always been so kind to me, and I dare not disobey. But honestly, every time I’m with you, I feel a bit nervous, worried that I might not act appropriately. Although the hot springs are a good thing, I feel it might not be suitable this time, so I’d better not go.
What's so special about hot springs, are they fun? Just hearing about it doesn't sound fun, I don't want to go.

Your Majesty, you have been so generous with me, how could I not comply? However, you know, my health has just improved a bit, and I’m truly a bit worried. While hot springs are beneficial, they might not be suitable for my frail health. To keep you from worrying, it might be better if I don’t go.
I’m not feeling well, and the royal physician said it’s not suitable for me to visit the hot springs right now. I can’t accompany you, so please pardon me, Your Majesty.

question: #question#How does An Lingrong use words to persuade the Emperor to grant her request?

content.content: Your Majesty, it’s too hot there, and I feel uneasy. I don’t want to go. You shouldn’t either, let’s go hunting together instead.
Your Majesty, I would really love to accompany you. Enjoying the hot springs is so comfortable. But I won’t go; I don’t like going to the hot springs with older people, it feels awkward.

Your Majesty, soaking in the hot springs is indeed very pleasant. I would love to go, but being there with you always makes me feel a bit reserved, and I can't truly relax. So, I’ll wait in the palace instead.

dialog.content: Alright, get ready. We'll set off in a few days.
Of course.
You're truly my beloved consort.

The Emperor and An Lingrong had a wonderful time at the hot springs, and the Emperor's thoughtfulness gradually won her over. On the night before returning to the palace, An Lingrong finally spent the night with him. After returning to the palace, the Emperor issued a decree to the six palaces, promoting An Lingrong to the rank of An Changzai.
You're not feeling well; I'll call the imperial physician to have a look at you.
No need, Your Majesty. I just need some rest.
Alright then.
The Emperor quickly lost interest in An Lingrong, who no longer posed a threat or faced any challenges, and she continued to live a lonely and peaceful life.
I have never seen such an arrogant woman. Leave the palace; the Forbidden City has no place for you.
Your Majesty, as long as you're happy.
Hmph, truly ungrateful. You will pay the price for your actions.

The Emperor expelled An Lingrong from the palace. Her father felt she had disgraced the family and, believing no one would marry her, also drove her out of the house. An Lingrong had no choice but to join a nunnery in the mountains, thus renouncing worldly attachments.
(furiously) What! You are my consort, how can you have another lover? This is treason against the throne!
Your Majesty, think whatever you like.
Fine, since that's the case, you will pay the price for your choice.

The Emperor banished An Lingrong from the palace. Her father, feeling shamed by her actions, also expelled her from the family home. An Lingrong was forced to rely on her beautiful singing voice, making a living in a brothel performing without selling her body.

(Thinking to herself) I never thought Lingrong could be such a shallow person. I won't open my heart to her ever again. But I can't burn bridges either. Since there's nothing here that interests you, and I'm feeling tired, you should head back to the palace.
In that case, sister, I'll leave now.
Alright, take care.
An Lingrong thus lost two good friends and, due to often showing off, fell out of favor with the Emperor, spending her remaining days lonely in the Forbidden City.
